name: feminity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact or quality of having characteristics that are traditionally thought to be typical of or suitable for a woman: Her lipstick and high heels, the symbols of her feminity, have somehow been elevated to iconic status. He believes that we are all on a spectrum of feminity and masculinity.
More examplesFewer examplesThe hare has traditionally been associated in stories with fertility and feminity.Her art depicts some of the competing images of feminity in our society.She considers feminity to be a phenomenon created by men who seek to control women.
